did.unittitle: Madeleine Boyd, New York, New York, to [Montgomery] Evans n.d.

scopecontent.p: Boyd expresses her difficulties in getting Aleister Crowley's manuscript published and explaining that a publication by a friend of his in the Hearst paper some two years ago is the cause of the refusals to publish. She notes that it is her intention to return the manuscript to Mr. Bradley, Crowley's agent, but that she is willing to hand it over to Evans, and that the manuscript is in need of much revision.
